The sum of digits of the main number is 
the same as the sum of digits a part of them 
after the dot 
repeatable pattern may occur 
if the first is .0 then all others are .9[sum of digits]
enter main number 
enter precision
2785 / 9 ::== 309.444444444444
2785 / 99 ::== 28.1313131313131
2785 / 999 ::== 2.78778778778779
2785 / 9999 ::== 0.278527852785279
2785 / 99999 ::== 0.027850278502785
2785 / 999999 ::== 0.00278500278500279
2785 / 9999999 ::== 0.000278500027850003
2785 / 99999999 ::== 2.78500002785e-05
2785 / 999999999 ::== 2.785000002785e-06
2785 / 9999999999 ::== 2.7850000002785e-07
2785 / 99999999999 ::== 2.78500000002785e-08
2785 / 999999999999 ::== 2.78500000000279e-09
2785 / 9999999999999 ::== 2.78500000000028e-10
